channel.title: How to let NRS3 server work with other clients
channel.description:
you want to let nrs3server work with other client? like disturbed? well here is tutorial
goto settings java src>com>rs>settings.java you wil see public static final int custum_client_build = 8); change it to 7 because most client has 7 then safe compile done
if you want to use the client with other servers goto the client map then src>loader.java look for public state final int sub_build = 8); change it to 7 safe compile done

item.title: How to let NRS3 server work with other clients

item.title: How to let NRS3 server work with other clients

item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

you want to let nrs3server work with other client? like disturbed?
well here is tutorial

goto settings java src>com>rs>settings.java
you wil see public static final int custum_client_build = 8);
change it to 7 because most client has 7 then safe compile done

if you want to use the client with other servers goto the client map then src>loader.java look for public state final int sub_build = 8); change it to 7 safe compile done
